original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa pariveṇavāsikā bhikkhuniyo yāguyā kilamanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa pariveṇa vāsikāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ yāguyā kilamanti

original: Atha kho so pūgo bhikkhunīnaṁ yāguatthāya chandakaṁ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa āpaṇikassa ghare parikkhāraṁ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
analyzed: atha kho saḥ pūgaḥ bhikkhunīnam yāgu atthāya chandakam saṅgharitvā aññatarassa āpaṇikassa ghare parikkhāram nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ upasaṅkamitvā etat avoca

original: “amukassa, ayye, āpaṇikassa ghare yāguatthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto, tato taṇḍulaṁ āharāpetvā yāguṁ pacāpetvā paribhuñjathā”ti.
analyzed: amukassa ayye āpaṇikassa ghare yāgu atthāya parikkhāraḥ nikkhittaḥ tatas taṇḍulam āharāpetvā yāgum pacāpetvā paribhuñjatha ati

original: Bhikkhuniyo tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṁ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṁsu.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyaḥ tena parikkhārena bhesajjam cetāpetvā paribhuñjisu

original: So pūgo jānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
analyzed: saḥ pūgaḥ jānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāca iti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṁ cetāpessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññam cetāpessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṁ cetāpentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññam cetāpenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṁ cetāpessanti.
analyzed: kathan hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññam cetāpessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṁ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññam cetāpeyya nissaggiyam pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
gaṇassa na saṅghassa na eka bhikkhuniyā

original: yaṁatthāya dinnaṁ taṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
analyzed: yaatthāya dinnam tam ṭhapetvā aññam payoge dukkaṭa

original: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
analyzed: nissajjitabbam saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā eka bhikkhuniyā vā

original: “idaṁ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṁ cetāpitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ imāhaṁ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
analyzed: idam me ayye aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññam cetāpitam nissaggiyam imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti pe

original: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike aññadatthika saññā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike vematikā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya

original: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṁ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: aññadatthike anaññadatthika saññā aññam cetāpeti nissaggiyam pācittiya
